endpoints._comment: Retrieving Keycloak token based on username and password
This API requires a valid Keycloak token with the 'realm_user' role for access, ensuring secure and authorized requests.

qos/http-cache.@comment: This API returns a cache-control: max-age=6000 so KrakenD will cache this for 60s

header.Modifier.name: Caching
header.Modifier.@comment: We will change the max-age policy before KrakenD checks the content for caching. Now content is cached 60 seconds.
